content: Dear Max, I’ve never read such a summarized and tailored opinion of what I have been doing for quite a while. Although, it’s hard to face the truth, I still believe MOOCS and free knowledge are the truest gold of the internet. Do not blame my intelectual curiosity, I have a passion for leaning new things, but this, has lead me to a enter into a purposeless loop sometimes. I think the key is find balance and see it, as tools to achieve goals. Thank you very much for such and insightful reading.
